description:
Replace static empty states with friendly, animated illustrations that show common use cases (team collaboration, personal productivity, project planning) with subtle motion to maintain visual interest.

**Rationale:** Static empty states feel lifeless and abandoned. Animated illustrations create emotional connection, reduce perceived emptiness, and inspire users about what's possible with the tool.
title: Animated Empty State Illustrations
